basics.name: Achyut Koirala
basics.label: Backend Developer.
basics.summary: Backend web applications developer, developing REST|GraphQL APIs

work.summary: Hyperce is an E-commerce suite partner for elevating businesses. I worked as Backend Developer with technologies like Vendure, GraphQL, Typescript, Angular and TypeORM and learned internal mechanism of e-commerce platform as well as working of a tech-startup
highlights: Learnt more about strictly typed languages
Gained knowlege on E-commerce business techniques and terminologies

work.summary: Role of Intern provided In-depth knowledge of hardware system design, troubleshooting computers in general, configuring Networks, and Backup and recovery of OS and File systems
highlights: Troubleshooting of Desktops and other Computers
Installed and Recovered different Operating Systems

education.institution: Oxford College of Engineering and Management
Institute of Science and Technology, Tribhuvan University

activities.summary: Learned backend development with Express, Node.js and MongoDB
Using OpenStreetMap’s API we built a plant management system to streamline all the forest-fires, deforestation issues and other mishaps using Node.js. More on GitHub.

Tech skills: Backend Web Development with Node.js and Go. (Express.js, Nest.js, Fiber, mux)
Understanding of REST, GraphQL APIs, database and Web Security. (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis)
Basic Knowledge of Deployment and Cloud Components. (Azure, Docker, Kubernetes)
Troubleshooting Computers, Project Management and Report writing.

top_projects.name: Vanarakshak
top_projects.overview: Vanarakshak is a web application that uses OpenStreetMap’s API to build a plant management system to streamline all the forest-fires, deforestation issues and other mishaps using Node.js. More on GitHub.
top_projects.key takeways: OpenStreetMap API, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Leaflet.js, Mapbox, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

top_projects.name: Applicant Tracking System
top_projects.overview: Making sense of all the incoming applicationa for job listings is tideous. It solves by providing a UI with extremely powerful API. Manage Job Postings, Applications, Hire the bests.
top_projects.key takeways: Typesafe with Typescript, Robust REST API, Backend MongoDb database

top_projects.name: Blogging Website
top_projects.overview: A Blog website for my projects and articles related to IT industry. It is written in Node.js and NoSQL database MongoDB is integrated as database. This website is live on the internet on Cyclic app and MongoDB Atlas, AWS cluster.
top_projects.key takeways: Pagination Function, Search-box Function, Mailing Function, Backend MongoDb database
